SD.text: Here are some of the materials I created using Substance Designer. The aim of this practice was to improve my skills in Substance Designer.

FBU.title: Forgotten but Unbroken
FBU.alt: Screenshot of enemy camp from video game Forgotten but Unbroken
FBU.text: Screenshots of maps I worked on during my time at Centurion Developments. I was part of the team developing Forgotten but Unbroken, a turn-based strategy game set during the events of World War II.

Oasis.title: Oasis
Oasis.text: Another personal project I created in my free time. This time, I wanted to do something more stylized with a focus on organic elements like rocks and vegetation.

Tomb.title: Greek Tomb
Tomb.text: A Greek tomb environment I created in my free time.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
Portfolio.alt: Web icon of Adam Kascak's portfolio website
Portfolio.textShort: Personal project. I wanted to make a website showcasing some of my work from different areas of visual arts.
Portfolio.tools:
Design: Figma, Krita, Adobe Illustrator 
 Programming: React, Tailwind CSS
Portfolio.text:
Personal project. I wanted to make a website showcasing some of my work from different areas of visual arts. I also wanted this website to combine my love for illustrating, so of course simple angular illustrations were used on the home page. I wanted to keep the color palette black and white, as I also like to work mostly with black and white for most of my illustrations. There are a total of 4 colors used on this website: white, light grey, dark grey, and black.
Fonts used are all geometric sans-serif. Circular shapes of Montserrat Alternates complement nicely with sharp edges of illustrations and rectangles on the website. In some places, I also used Futura PT, this time for sharp edges on some of its symbols, like A and F.
The website was created by me from start to finish, including web development. I used the React framework with Tailwind CSS, as this is the combination I'm most comfortable with.

Horn.title: Horn Box Gym Website
Horn.alt: Web icon of website of boxing studio in Bratislava
Horn.textShort: Fully responsive and accessible website of fictional boxing gym based in Bratislava.
Horn.tools:
Design: Figma, Adobe Illustrator 
 Programming: HTML, CSS, Javascript
Horn.text: H is a fictional fitness brand built around the spirit of boxing, martial arts, and conditioning training. The goal was to capture the raw energy and discipline of combat sports while keeping the brand approachable and inspiring for everyday athletes The design concept emphasizes boldness and strength while maintaining an approachable and friendly look — powerful but not intimidating. The logo, featuring a stylized bull’s skull, is rounded and simplified to convey energy and determination without aggression. Angled elements are used throughout the layout to enhance a sense of motion and dynamism. The landing page includes the following sections:  Home Banner | Equipment | Trainings | Prices | Instructors | Reviews | Gallery | Footer The design was created in Figma and developed using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript, with a strong focus on responsive design across all devices, SEO optimization, and accessibility.

Torse.title: Torse Animation Landing Page
Torse.alt: Thumbnail of black and white interior design studio
Torse.textShort: Fully responsive and accessible website of fictional interior design studio using modern animations
Torse.tools:
Design: Figma, Photoshop, Blender 
 Programming: React, Tailwind, GSAP
Torse.text: Torse — Interior Design Studio Landing Page A sleek and high-contrast web landing page concept for a fictional interior design studio. The design emphasizes bold minimalism, featuring a black-and-white color palette and League Spartan typography to convey modernity and strength. Design created in Figma. Developed with React, Tailwind CSS, and GSAP for smooth, dynamic animations. Hero Visual: Rendered in Blender using Freestyle for a stylized, architectural illustration look. Video showcasing the process by Transient at Large is available on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LElPE7R7Ka0 Explore the live page on GitHub Pages:: https://adammkass.github.io/torse/

ScrollLock.title: ScrollLock Parallax effect
ScrollLock.alt: Thumbnail of modern landing pages of coffee shop and streetwear fashion brand
ScrollLock.textShort: Fully responsive modern websites using sleek parallax scrolling to achieve scrolllock effect.
ScrollLock.tools:
Design: Figma 
 Programming: React, Tailwind, GSAP, Motion, Lenis
ScrollLock.text: Two landing pages using two animation libraries, GSAP an Motion achieving same effect in two versions. Obne version is horizontall slider and other one is vertical scrolling with snap.

about.intro: My name is Adam Kaščák. I'm a freelance web developer and designer based in Nitra, SLovakia. I focus on designing and creating modern and professional websites.
about.hobbies: With background in both 3D graphics and illustration, I enjoy blending 3D models or hand-painted artwork with web design
about.alt: Adam Kascak smiling in front of sailing ship

services.title: Services
services.description: Develop your passion project with eye catching branding, packaging, web design & illustrations.

web.title: Web Design and Development
web.about: I can redesign or design brand new landing page for your brand and implement it using modern tools, such as Motion, Tailwind or GSAP

3d.title: 3D Assets and Environment Art
3d.about: I have skills to create 3D assets from scratch to finish, including optimization and lighting in scene. I specialise mostly on props, modular architecture and nature props.

illustration.title: Illustrations
illustration.about: I can create simple yet striking icons and vector graphics, or I can create traditional illustrations, mostly focusing on portraits and architecture.

services.getInTouch: If you're interested in working together, feel free to contact me.
